showScoreExcerpt:
"Directed by Austin Pendleton, the show is slightly dated with references to Giuliani as mayor. Yet it still feels somewhat relevant...After all these years, 73 year old Stephen McKinley Henderson finally plays the leading man, presenting a master class in acting."
